Package com.abn.amro.controller

Class RecipeController

java.lang.Object
com.abn.amro.controller.RecipeController
@RestController @RequestMapping("recipe") public class RecipeController extends Object
The Controller for Recipe REST endpoints.

This class handles the crud operations of Recipe via HTTP actions.

Author:
Bala Susmitha Vinjamuri

  • Method Details

    • getAllRecipes

      @GetMapping("/getAll") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<com.abn.amro.model.Recipe>> getAllRecipes()
      Gets all the recipes.
      Returns:
      Recipes with HTTP status code OK if recipes exists and HTTP status code NOT_FOUND if there are no recipies.

    • getRecipeDetails

      @GetMapping(path="/{id}") public com.abn.amro.model.Recipe getRecipeDetails(@PathVariable Long id)
      Gets the requested recipe by RecipeId.
      Parameters:
      Recipe - id
      Returns:
      Requested Recipe with status code OK if recipe exists and Recipe Not Found message with HTTP status code NOT_FOUND if requested recipe does not exists.

    • createNewRecipe

      @PostMapping(value="/create", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> createNewRecipe(@RequestBody com.abn.amro.model.Recipe recipe)
      Create a Recipe with the given data
      Parameters:
      A - JSON respresentation of recipe object
      Returns:
      Saved Successfully message with status code CREATED if recipe created and Save Failed message with status code BAD_REQUEST if recipe does not saved due to any issues.

    • updateRecipe

      @PutMapping("/update/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<com.abn.amro.model.Recipe> updateRecipe(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody com.abn.amro.model.Recipe recipe)
      Updates a Recipe with the given data
      Parameters:
      Recipe - id
      A - JSON respresentation of recipe object
      Returns:
      Updated recipe with status code OK and HTTP status code NOT_FOUND if there is no such Recipe.

    • deleteRecipe

      @DeleteMapping(value="/delete/{id}", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> deleteRecipe(@PathVariable Long id)
      Deletes a Recipe with the given data
      Parameters:
      Recipe - id
      Returns:
      Deleted Successfully message with status code OK if deleted and Deletion error with status code INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR if any error
